alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos; Reeves County Plains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:38PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pecos, northwestern Brewster, south central Reeves and southeastern Jeff Davis Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 538 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles northeast of Alpine, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Star Mountain. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 213 and 225. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos; Reeves County Plains
